ComicInfo.Summary: ZombieWorld: Champion of the Worms [Part Three of Three]: Gotha's last sacrifice is accomplished and the world's dead rise up and begin to eliminate mankind. With his failure Damson is about to end it all when he is given a sliver of hope by the appearance of an ancient priestess who emblazons the Seal of Abbram on Damson's palm. The Seal is a powerful sigil which is their only current weapon usable against Gotha. Damson thinks that there may be hope for humanity after all.
ComicInfo.Title: ZombieWorld: Champion of the Worms [Part Three of Three]
ComicInfo.Characters: Malka Ravenstein,Eustace St. John,Rebecca Dean,Azzul Gotha,Roman,Major Damson,Ancient Priestess
